properties.name: jwt.accessSecret
properties.description: 'jwt.accessSecret' defines the secret signing key for the jwt access tokens to be generated

properties.name: jwt.refreshSecret
properties.description: 'jwt.refreshSecret' defines the secret signing key for the jwt refresh tokens to be generated

properties.name: spring.application.instance_id
properties.description: A random string that uniquely identifies a instance of the service

properties.name: jwt.keys.public
properties.description: Public key used to decode JWT token

properties.name: jwt.keys.private
properties.description: Private key used to encode JWT token
